entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
